opinion.opinion_text:
This change of child custody case is affirmed under Rule 59 without prejudice to the appellant to seek visitation rights in the trial court.
Judgment affirmed. All the Justices concur.

opinion_text.center: ARGUED JULY 11, 1979 — DECIDED SEPTEMBER 10, 1979 — REHEARING DENIED SEPTEMBER 25, 1979.
